name: Comet Doom
description:
You're mining a comet, but it's moved into an asteroid belt around a planet and is about to be vapourised by its atmosphere. Your turbo charged jetpack is out of power, and you need to collect crystals on the comet to recharge it. You estimate that the comet will be destroyed in five minutes, collect enough crystals and escape with your jetpack before it's too late!

Game was made within 12 hours for the Galway Game Jam 7 by a single developer.
